Articles.Content:
Sees a giant multi milion part craft with jeb in the pilot seat

and ninjaed again....

You burst into the sunlight, with the dirt exploding into raw energy as the atoms themselves are ripped into their subatomic particles. You set your sights on a massive rocket hurling itself toward your domain.
you then look to your right and see jeb with...
COMMAND: Flee.
You call to jeb and the 2 of you run away screaming

You arrive at an open field, the kraken squirming towards you just 100 meters behind. Do you run and hide:

in the r+d building

under the launchpad

behind the capsule monument

next to the runway monolith

in the water
Run to R&D building!

You see a bunch of kerbals researching stuff. Do you...

>Annoy them

>Help them

I noticed a lot of the previous pages turned into a continue-the-story rather than text adventure.
Help them!

Flashpoints ignite in keyboards, Mainframes explode and science is performed..

What tech do you wish to upgrade?

SRBs!

-thank, tenchar

SRB's will now overheat and explode after 5 seconds of burn time.

What do you want to build today?
An Srb rocket with Jeb straped to it.

You are at the launchpad with Jeb strapped to a single SRB.

Do you want to:

Push the launch button

Abort the launch

Wait

Get some more boosters
ger some more boosters

Jeb is still strapped to the SRB, now looking a little hungry, while you go for more boosters. As you ducktape the boosters to the SRB, you notice a strange clicking sound coming from one of the boosters.

Do you:

Continue taping the boosters to the SRB

Feed Jeb

Inspect the strangely clicking booster
inspect the strangely clicking booster

There a bomb placed by the purple kerbal

What do you do?
Disarm (tenchars)

You disarm the bomb

do you

A. feed jeb

B. add MOAR BOOSTERS

c. launch it
B-add moar booster

you continue adding boosters but then jeb screams FEED ME

do you

A. keep adding MOAR BOOSTER

B. Feed Jeb

As you give Jeb some food, you notice a piece of loose skin in his neck. Underneath the pealed of skin you see a glow of purple.

Do you:

Neglect your discovery

Report your discovery
Report your discovery

It's a Kraken bone

Report it to real scientist

Eat it
